text: Flers is a commune. It is in Hauts-de-France in the Somme department in north France.Commune de Flers (80314), INSEE ==History== In 1916, the Battle of Flersâ€“Courcelette saw the first use of the tank (the Mark I) in the field of battle. ==References== Category:Communes in Somme
title: Flers, Somme
